item.title: The House Hot Sheet for Week 6 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats
item.description: News article "The House Hot Sheet for Week 6 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats" from House Democrats.

item.title: 👍💵Ryan Donohue - Habitat for Humanity Seattle-King & Kittitas Counties
item.description: Ryan Donohue signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Habitat for Humanity Seattle-King & Kittitas Counties. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Curtis Steinhauer signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington State Association of Counties. They are a registered lobbyist.
